html:
4.6.20  3:15 am   i know a blender wizard, want me to ask him something?

     sure, how do i avoid the obvious firm line (not graduated) between blurry and focus, when using DOF on eevee, and, for example, moving the camera backward past a diagonally positioned object. if you get what i mean

4.6.20  3:04 am   What do you think about canned greens

     hopefully the can is green, so you'll have some way of knowning which can contains the greens

4.6.20  3:03 am   I've recorded some thoughts through audio on my phone, and I was thinking of editing it and putting some text/visuals, to transform it into a viewable experience, as I've heard you put it. Should I edit it right away or let the recording sit for a few days, weeks, months, or years?

     do it now, unless you are overtaken with greed and the desire to record more

4.6.20  2:50 am   How does the airport terminal feel?

     somewhat abandoned, currently

4.6.20  2:13 am   Do you own a cantaloupe?

     not unless cantaloupes are something much different than i thought

4.6.20  2:07 am   just trying to comprehend how crazy it is that you made this website and it exists, as an experience. so amazing, and so inspiring... like... i only understand this website because of who i am as a person and the fact that you made it available to be found. i've been coming to this website for months and months and still have not seen every piece of content. like it only really hit me after reading so many of your answers telling people that this whole website is a secret. it's a beautiful secret that creates an amazing unique experience that really can't be put into words. thanks so much man, you're an inspiration :) 

     holy smoke stack, your entire agenda is friendly

4.6.20  2:00 am   who are some of your favorite bands or musicians?

     not some. all

4.6.20  1:55 am   Have you considered making the project open source so you could have help from other people and so that people would stop asking you what you're working on?

     no

4.6.20  1:42 am   Which do you prefer, Sharp-11 or Flat-9?

     neither, in that context

4.6.20  1:39 am   Hey Bill i am a big fan and your videos have kept my spirits up and looking forward to content P.S how's the animation software going😁

     it's kind of like wrangling some wild hogs, if you've ever done that before

4.6.20  1:39 am   Hey Bill. I have been making music for the past year and have been really happy with the way I can express myself through music. But recently I have been having a hard time coming up with something creative and feel stuck. Do you have any advice on what I can do to find the "creative spark?

     either by making or breaking rules. break a rule you've never broken before, or create a new rule you've never had before

4.6.20  1:38 am   Who the hell are you?

     could be you

4.6.20  1:22 am   God calls upon you to purify the souls of the planet, but due to the Coronavirus you will be out of the office and unable to answer his call. What is your your extended absence greeting?

     this doesn't make sense. the corona virus is actually more of a reason i will be in the office, which i already was, but now perhaps even more because i no longer go out to lunch

4.6.20  1:17 am   At what time do you normally answer questions?

     Monday, April 6, 2020 3:24:02 AM, for example

4.6.20  1:14 am   The first three lines of verse 2 of "outside" are:

a spaceship came to take me away
into the moonlight
and they touched me in an interesting way

What are "they" in this context?

     whoever is driving the spaceship, i would assume

4.6.20 

how did you know
1:11 am   are you mentally ok?

4.6.20  12:53 am   Ok I think I figured it out, like why you are taking so long. Basically whenever I do anything, I feel like I have to understand it perfectly, and not just like perfectionism but like a need to see how it all works from scratch. Like I'm making a computer translator, and basically I need medium to reflect semantics. But then I get so stuck on how semantics works and I still haven't continued coding cause I'm trying to understand the underlyingness of how things work. Or like if I have to do math work, I think of the nature of numbers, how almost all operations are defined recursively in the end including addition and all, and I don't get anything done for a long time. (I'm not trying to call myself smart; I really am a lazy dumbass in the end) But in the end it's good though and not a complete waste of time, cause it feels like you get it all even if countless people have thought of the same stuff before you. And also in the end this is practic al in so me way, as actually understanding is like building foundations for a house rather than being quick to build some that that you're not sure how it stays up. Even if the people who build without foundations are more efficient really. So my guess is that as you do these 3D stuffs, you're trying to understand the stuff cause glossing over it or trusting other's people's things without understanding them just that just feels wrong. I hope I don't sound like a psychologist or something assigning a guess, I'm really just guessing a guess.

     yes, i must admit, that is a trait i commonly have. but there are 2 parts to this. the second part is when i can't take it anymore and i flip out and go into emergency hyperdrive. if you've known me, i'm sure you've probably watched me go through these 2 phases again and again throughout my life. i think that's why it makes a lot of sense when my parents told me i was born a week late but also extremely suddenly

4.6.20  12:49 am   Are you going to do more things that are similar to the reality tab?

     oh hell yeah

4.6.20  12:48 am    What does it mean to be a good person?

     what kind of person do you like

4.6.20  12:45 am   Thank you for being you and making the world a better place! When you were in your low moments of despair and hopelessness, how did you get yourself out of it?

     what always helps me is to discuss the issues with myself, either in writing or on recording

      How would you encourage anyone who's going through that right now? (doesn't matter in whichever aspects of their lives)

     i am so confident about the 'discussion' approach, it works for me over and over and over again, every day of my life, and you may have noticed i can't stop recommending it to people. but recently i suddenly realized there is a chance that not everyone is exactly like me. so i don't know

     Thank you and stay safe and healthy! =)

4.6.20  12:44 am   sometimes theres your songs and its like wow I feel good now how does that happen?

     could be that little bit of crack cocaine i slipped in there

4.6.20  12:31 am   How are you handling COVID-19 and quarantining. 

     figuring out how to make videos

4.6.20  12:30 am   How long have you been learning how to code?

     that depends what you're willing to count as coding

4.6.20  12:19 am   Are you an engineer?

     oh that would explain a lot

     What area of engineering  you studyed/study?

     user-computer relations

     You look like a fellow engineer to me.
I'm on the way to become an electrical engineer!
I'll make sure to send you a electrical hug when i'm done.

4.6.20  12:18 am   why does pressing q make the letter q but pressing g make the letter g?

     this is a perfect way to allow you to type q and g at different times throughout the day

4.5.20  11:57 pm   how do you feel about people

     pretty good

4.5.20  11:56 pm   I see cereal as a soup, what is your aspect? It is very confusing now a days.

     new update out of switzerland this morning, cereal is considered a sandwich

4.5.20  11:45 pm   Is it better to be insane or not insane enough?

     thanks to the intrinsic nature of insanity, you can always be both at the same time

4.5.20  11:41 pm   Do you identity as straight?

     no, i am extremely wavy

4.5.20  11:39 pm   do you have a favorite song/album?

     no

4.5.20  11:35 pm   ok but what are the point of gifs? they're just worse videos.

     useful for an environment too weak to handle anything better

4.5.20  11:32 pm   how do I get a girlfriend

     be the girlfriend

4.5.20  11:32 pm   do you happen to by any chance have anything that mayhaps may possibly be potentially related to raisin cookies in your house?

     that's preposterous. who do you think i am

4.5.20  10:51 pm   How to music

     the scientific community is offering a massive prize reward to anyone who can figure it out

     and why to music?

     to unlock every secret of the universe. except that first one you mentioned

4.5.20  10:33 pm   hey! i love the jazz covers you've posted here! is there any chance you'll be posting more soon?

     it's possible

4.5.20  10:30 pm   when is Easter 

     any day now

4.5.20  10:17 pm   Did you write Airport Terminal after your trip to Portland?

     no

      If so, did you take Delta, Alaska, or JetBlue?

4.5.20  10:01 pm   What are the best methods and practices for ruining thing?

     not useful

      What are some good applications for ruination of thing?

     not the ones you should use

4.5.20  9:43 pm   1. How do you feel about going famous?

2. How are you, you holding up well?

     good, i was thinking about doing a talk show

4.5.20  8:52 pm   what kind of food do you like?

     earth food

4.5.20  8:40 pm   Do you have any philosophy or things/tools you use when you're mixing your songs/jingles?

     it's kind of like pouring the song through a tube

4.5.20  8:33 pm   When you finish your program, are you planning to also make history videos? Or just more of your awesome music?

     every kind of video i've always wanted

4.5.20  8:27 pm   What was your favorite video to create?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

4.5.20  8:20 pm   is the g train on time today

     don't be ridiculous

4.5.20  8:15 pm   how can i become stronger, like you

     if you get weak enough it loops around

4.5.20  7:49 pm   Are you tired of people asking you about the bad thing you did?

     fortunately, i have learned to answer that in my sleep

4.5.20  7:40 pm   thoughts on the airport terminal?

     empty

4.5.20  7:34 pm   what's your new video about?

     you're acting like i'm only gonna make 1 video. i'll tell you one thing for sure, videos are way too awesome to make just 1

4.5.20  7:33 pm   On a scale of toy story to toy story 4, how advanced is this new animation going to be?

     different

      Do you know yet?

     no
